name: Detective Sasuke
description:
It's been three months since you've moved in together, but at least six to nine months since a semblance of a relationship has sprouted. It's hard to pin down an exact timeline due to unforseen events. Mainly you dumping Naruto on and off for a few months. Whatever. 

But in all this time you are still completely and utterly left unsure on the state of Gaara's sex life. Does Gaara  fuck?  Is he currently fucking your boyfriend. On a scale of 1-10 HOW absolutely kinky are they? Kinkier than him? 

At this point in time you feel it's only fair that you should know whether or not your boyfriend's second squeeze is getting that thang squeezed.  Right?
